name: Luke Baldock
content: Bugal has made invoicing and scheduling so much easier for my business. It's simple to use and gets the job done quickly. There are a few things I’d love to see as it grows, but even now, it’s a solid and valuable tool. Keep up the great work team!

name: Melanie
content: Bugal makes invoicing easy once you know your way around, and the customer support has been excellent. It’s simple, effective, and has everything I need!

name: Megan
content: I have gone from spreadsheets and word documents which took time and had mistakes to doing things straight away, keeping on top of things and getting my weekends back!

name: Snezana Vranic
content: I’ve been using Bugal for over a year now, and I love that I can handle both invoicing and shift notes all in one place. It just makes things easier!
